org.hibernate.search.backend.impl

Interface CommitPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommitPolicy, NRTCommitPolicy, PerChangeSetCommitPolicy, ScheduledCommitPolicy, SharedIndexCommitPolicy

    public interface CommitPolicy
    Policy for committing changesets. Implementations of this interface will decide the commit strategy based of three backend related events: after a changeset is applied, when an explicit flush is requested and when backend closing
    Author:
    gustavonalle
